# Nevada Assisted Living
> 2026 Independent Resource Guide for Nevada families navigating senior care and financial aid.

## Core Resources
- [Henderson Guide](https://nevadaassistedliving.org/henderson-assisted-living.html): 2026 cost breakdown and neighborhood reviews for Henderson, NV.
- [Financial Aid](https://nevadaassistedliving.org/financial-aid.html): Latest Medicaid waiver limits and "One Big Beautiful Bill" tax deduction info.
- [Memory Care](https://nevadaassistedliving.org/memory-care.html): Safety standards and staffing ratios for Alzheimer's facilities.

## Targeted Audience
Families of seniors in Clark and Washoe counties seeking independent, non-biased care advice.
